channel.title: Allstar Making Shops Accept pkpoints
channel.description: I have a pk point system in place, everything works with it, I'm just wondering how to make the pk point shop I made "From an NPC" accept pk points as the currency. I have tried some tutorials from Other sites, and they all seem to fail. Maybe its because Im using allstar, but I know its possible. Thanks In advance.

item.title: Allstar Making Shops Accept pkpoints
item.dc:creator: @Dokan42 Dokan42
item.description:
@Dokan42 wrote:

I have a pk point system in place, everything works with it, I’m just wondering how to make the pk point shop I made “From an NPC” accept pk points as the currency. I have tried some tutorials from Other sites, and they all seem to fail. Maybe its because Im using allstar, but I know its possible. Thanks In advance.
